TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_sumanahay, title = sumanahay, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/sumanahay} }

S.FORM: sulit nu hulam:紅色 tinaku a kamu sumanahay 紅色 sumanahay ku tupel nu maku. 我的帽子是紅色的.
solit no holam:紅色 tinako a kamo somanahay 紅色 somanahay ko topel no mako. 我的帽子是紅色的.
